1.text: This switch is a media converter. Only optics metrics will be reported.

panels.description: Scrape interval for snmp-exporter metrics (named if*), averaged over the last 15 minutes
panels.title: snmp-exporter rate

panels.description: Scrape interval for linkmon metrics (named linkmon_*), averaged over the last 15 minutes
panels.title: linkmon rate

1.text: FEC misconfiguration: FEC disabled on a 100GBASE-DR transceiver.

targets.expr: count(linkmon_switch_extra_labels{switch="$switch", port=~"$port", opt_speed=~"100GBASE-DR", fec_enabled="false"} * on (switch) group_left (vendor) (linkmon_switch_version_info{switch="$switch", vendor="Credo"})) != 0

panels.title: ECN Marked Packets on TC5 count
